WorkItem.ClosedComment: I repeat: This is fixed with the new filters, issue closed
WorkItem.Description:
Rawr filter's 1H Axes in the Rogue module.
 
Go to Tool->Refine Types of Items Listed. Note that the "1 Handed Axe" check box is unchecked and disabled.
 
Rogues have been able to use Axes since 3.2

Comments.Message: Others have seen that, create a new Rogue and look at it again, it should be available. Older file saves seem to lock it out.

This should be fixed with the new filters



** Closed by Jothay 9/24/2009 9:51 AM

Nope. Still not working as originally described.

Creating a new character and selecting rogue, importing with a character profiler, importing fresh from the armory or loading a saved character. None of these methods work for creating a rogue character in Rawr that will list axes in main or off-hand slots. And the check box for 1 handed axes in "Refine Types of Items Listed" stays grey and unclickable.

This is just a tought, I dont know how you guys usualy handle "issues" here with rawr... But I would say that the issue is "fixed" atm, and "closed" when it's verified in a new release. I.e. maybe this is fixed if you download the source and compile it yourself, but it's still present if you download the latest pre-built release...
